testimonials.description: Our team wants to setup our own crowdfunding campaign, without a 3rd party involved.

testimonials.designation: member of a local health organization

testimonials.description: We had too many calls in too many different meeting rooms. Now we found a way to structure our meetings better!

testimonials.description: We are working on many different projects and want to set a better focus on important tasks, so we switched to bounties.

testimonials.description: Our team is distributed and we want to measure the involvement of all contributors & reward them accordingly. Is there a way to automate that?

testimonials.description: We finally found a way to automate the tracking of rewards & expenses and can build a real balance-sheet.
testimonials.name: Johann
